title: National Alliance will have to repay EUR 210 thousand to Latvian state
summary_full: The National Alliance party will have to repay the state budget for the unlawfully used state budget funds in the amount of EUR 210,673, the LETA agency found out in court.
summary_public: The National Alliance party will have to repay the state budget for the unlawfully used state budget funds in the amount of EUR 210,673, the LETA agency found out in court.

LV.label: positive
LV.evidence: repay EUR 210 thousand to Latvian state
